page.title: 04 RELIGION
page.content: "Churches generally do not only support themselves but they also do good work in the community, for example the Baptist Church is providing tea for all the old folks, the people of the Silver Link Club.We give money to other charities like other churches do:to Christian Aid; the missionary societies; Save the Children Fund; Famine in Ethiopia: this sort of thing. Last year our church gave away over,Â£1,100 to other charities, to other people and we have people from the church go round sick-visiting and the carol singers that go from the churches,they collect money and then use it to visit people who are sick or living on their own.Once a fortnight they give Â£1 each for the service."
